mapper.insert: insert into dm_message(message_no, room_no, member_sender, message_content, message_send_time, message_read_time) values(dm_message_seq.nextval, #{roomNo}, #{memberSender}, #{messageContent}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: select message_no, room_no, member_sender, message_content, message_send_time from dm_message where room_no = #{roomNo} order by message_send_time desc
